entities.name: onion soup
entities.description: The smell of onion soup is mentioned as something good.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is introduced as a character who turns hopefully in the direction of the table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who didn't expect to arrive until morning.

relationships.description: Mr Weasley greets Harry by shaking hands.
Mrs Weasley serves food to Harry, specifically a bowl of soup.
